data.title: Sales & Traffic - Product Tags
data.meta_description: Custom Product Tags for Strategic Product Grouping and Analysis

​

Introduction

With Product Tags you can effortlessly group and organize products in the Sales & Traffic tab, streamlining the review of reports and performance analysis of distinct product groups. You can define your own three product tags, creating customized keys and values.

For instance, keys could include Category, Product Stage, or Target Total ACOS, while values might encompass options like Kids' Shoes, Newly Launched, or 25%.

Assigning these product tags to each ASIN allows you to categorize and organize your products effectively.

​

In the Sales & Traffic table, you can then group products based on these tags, facilitating easy comparison and analysis of performance across different product groupings.

Moreover, you can assign these tags in bulk to various ASINs, download the table data, and filter the table based on product tags.

​

This functionality is invaluable for customers who seek to group products by Amazon brand, Amazon category, and common product attributes such as colour, size, or flavour. By doing so, you can generate reports on performance against the budget set for these diverse product groupings, aiding in strategic decisions regarding enabling, pausing, doubling down, or scaling back ads on specific product groups.

Product Tags Spreadsheet Breakdown

Getting your product tags uploaded is just a few steps away. Ensure a smooth process by reviewing the following considerations when editing the spreadsheet: familiarize yourself with the table structure, address any errors promptly, and be prepared for seamless uploading

Product Tags Spreadsheet Editing

1️⃣ Edit the Columns D, E, and F with the Tag's name you wish.

Example: Category, Color and Size.

2️⃣ Enter the Tag values you wish to assign to your ASINs to the corresponding row. There is no limit on the number of values.

Example:

Category (Tag) = Shoes, Tape and RedPluot (Values)

​

​3️⃣ Continue editing the file by entering the remaining values for the other 2 Tags.

​

Troubleshooting Spreadsheet Errors

The "Errors" column (H) in the spreadsheet provides details on why the file upload failed.

Listed below are several potential errors you might encounter, along with their respective solutions for resolution:

1️⃣ ASIN Does Not Exist

This feature is being continuously improved. The above lists will be updated regularly to reflect the current state.

​

Download ASIN Report and Amazon Brands Report by Tags

You can export your ASIN Report and Amazon Brand report by tag by using a Daily or an Aggregate Performance:

​

1️⃣ Daily Performance: create an individual row for each ASIN tag daily performance metrics for the specified date range.

​2️⃣ Aggregate Performance: create an individual row for each ASIN tag aggregated performance metrics for the specified date range.
